summary: 1962  was a common year starting on Monday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1962  was a common year starting on Monday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1962nd year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 962nd year of the 2nd millennium, the 62nd year of the 20th century, and the 3rd year of the 1960s decade.
